EmailTemplate.description: User announcements update for sprint 25 dev release
EmailTemplate.name: Upcoming Salesforce Changes 25 dev update
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: Intermittent Salesforce issues resolved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Due to our release on Monday, January 8th, some users are experiencing intermittent Salesforce issues. To fix this issue, please log out of your salesforce instance. When you log back in, the issue will be resolved.
If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out to salesforcesupport@wework.com
Warmly, Susie
